#include <stdio.h>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
  int t = 0;
  scanf("%d\n", &t);
  while (t--) {
    int R, B, r, b;
    scanf("%d %d %d %d\n", &R, &B, &r, &b);
    r = -r;
    vector<vector<double> > arr(R+1, vector<double>(B+1, 0));
    for (int j = 0; j < B+1; ++j) {
      arr[0][j] = j*b;
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < R+1; ++i) {
      arr[i][0] = 0;
    }
    int n = 100;
    long sum = 0;
    for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++){
        sum += (long)i;
    }
    for (int i = 1; i < R+1; ++i) {
      for (int j = 1; j < B+1; ++j) {
        double pr = i/(double)(i+j);
        double pb = j/(double)(i+j);
        arr[i][j] = max(0.00, pr*(r+arr[i-1][j]) + pb*(b+arr[i][j-1]));
        pr++;
        pb -= pr;
        
      }
    }
    printf("%.8f\n", arr[R][B]);
  }
  return 0;
}
